title: GA Hmm
name: gahmm
description: Redirects GA ajax calls on other sites to your own tracking ID.
author: Tristan

preferences.name: gaDomainName
preferences.title: Enter a domain name you own. Do not include "http://"
preferences.description: GA will log activity as if it occured here. For example, http://www.3rdparty.com/index.html will be logged as http://www.yourdomain.com/www.3rdparty.com/index.html

preferences.name: gaTrackingId
preferences.title: Enter your GA tracking ID.
preferences.description: If you're not sure what this is then you might be using the wrong extension, sorry :^(
